description: SolidStart API で Zod 検証

files.template:
import { z } from 'zod';
export const POST = async ({ request }: any) => { const s=z.object({ name:z.string() }); const b=await request.json(); const r=s.safeParse(b); if(!r.success) return new Response('bad',{status:400}); return Response.json({ ok:true }); };
